property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.queues
property.description: The queues at the this level (root is the root queue).

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.hb.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.gx.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lxj.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lw.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.fy.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.capacity
property.description: Default queue target capacity.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.hb.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.gx.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lxj.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lw.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.fy.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.state
property.description: The state of the default queue. State can be one of RUNNING or STOPPED.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.acl_submit_applications
property.description: The ACL of who can submit jobs to the root queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.hb.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.gx.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lxj.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.lw.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.fy.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.

property.name: yarn.scheduler.capacity.root.default.acl_administer_queue
property.description: The ACL of who can administer jobs on the default queue.
